content: Docker Daily Tips 清空所有容器 docker stop $(docker ps -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) docker 拉镜像:error response from daemon yum install bind-utils dig @114.114.114.114 registry-1.docker.io echo "54.175.43.85 registry-1.docker.io'" >> /etc/hosts

content: Linux Daily Tips 文件清空 cat /dev/null > file ## xargs ```console ls ./* | xargs -i cp {} /tmp/ sed sed -i 's/password: .*/password: 123456/g' file awk cat file | awk '$1 ~ /th/ {print $1}' 执行命令忽略报错信息 unalias cp 2>/dev/null || true 文件追加内容 echo 'content' >> file
